original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2391)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2391)@</color> 將武將與他帶領的部分部隊，傳送到指定位置。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2391)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2391)@</color> Send the general and some of his troops to the designated location.
